snippet: Pop Warner Football will limit the amount of contact young players will face in practice, which will affect hundreds of thousands of youth football players, some as young as 5 years old.
abstract: Pop Warner football, in response to growing concerns over head injuries, will limit the amount of contact young players will face in practice, which will affect hundreds of thousands of football players, some as young as 5 years old.
lead_paragraph: Pop Warner Football will limit the amount of contact young players will face in practice, which will affect hundreds of thousands of youth football players, some as young as 5 years old.

headline.seo: Pop Warner Football Limits Contact in Practices
headline.main: Trying to Reduce Head Injuries, Youth Football Limits Practices
headline.print_headline: Trying to Reduce Head Injuries, Youth Football Limits Practices
